import { Card, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../App.css' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import { AiFillStar, AiOutlineHeart } from 'react-icons/ai'; const ItemComp = ({ itemTitle, itemImg }) => { return (
detail #1 list #1
detail #2 list #2
) } const imageStyle = { width: 450 } const buttonTypeStyle = { marginRight: 20 } const hrStyle = { marginTop: 20, marginBottom: 20 } const spanStyleLeft = { paddingLeft: 30, fontWeight: 500 } const spanStyleRight = { paddingLeft: 20, fontWeight: 500 } export default ItemComp
